name: The Ghost House
description:
THE GHOST HOUSE

A short but scary First-Person PSX retro style horror game where you explore a creepy abandoned house that has evil spirits inside. 

EXPLORE - You can explore the creepy house environment.

SPIRITS - an evil spirit will chase you around the house once you open a secret door.

DOORS - some doors require a key 

Controls:

F - Flashlight

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Looking

Shift - Sprint

DISCLAMER: In this game you only get ONE life, and if you die the game ends.
